title: Electronics Recycling Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Free Geek (Toronto, ON)
Interview Descriptions: Got hooked with this place when I needed a job and was newly discharged from the hospital. First I was referred by my nurse and then I had the interview with Shannon. The interview was easy and the job was not as demanding I'd say because I used to work there once a week. But Shannon was really nice and understanding and hired me the next week. I didn't have to explain much except my past employment and future goals etc. It was overall an easy hire but I was also into electronics so that was a plus.
Interview Questions: What is your previous work experience?

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Free Geek (Portland, OR) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: The interview was conducted from a Reboot referral through WorkSource. An appointment for an interview was made after attending a skills class. Next was the  interview then accepted for the internship.
